meanings.sent1: The nervure of the leaf carries nutrients to different parts of the plant.
meanings.sent2: The botanist studied the nervure patterns in various types of leaves.
meanings.sent3: The nervure of the leaf was so prominent, it looked like a tiny road map.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of plants was like following the nervure of a leaf, leading to new discoveries.
meanings.sent5: The nervure of the leaf stood out like a green highway on a map.

meanings.definition: A rib or ridge in a fabric.
meanings.sent1: The nervure in the fabric added texture to the design.
meanings.sent2: She ran her fingers along the nervure of the silk dress, feeling its smoothness.
meanings.sent3: The nervure in the fabric seemed to dance under the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The nervure of the fabric resembled the backbone of a beautiful dress.
meanings.sent5: The nervure of the fabric was like a gentle wave in a sea of cloth.
